name: Lady Gondafrey
resist: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

trait.name: False Appearance
text: While the gargoyle remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an inanimate statue.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The gargoyle makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

description:
Lafy Gondafrey is the result of a magical experiment, a gargoyle that has been imbued with the personality of a human knight of Tyr (god of justice). Manshoon is amused by the creature so keeps it alive and locked in a cell.
Source: Waterdeep: Dragon Heist p. 152
